data.what_is:
Xoxoday Plum helps automate rewards, incentives & payouts programs at a global scale with multi-currency and multi-region capabilities. We make it simple for the marketing and sales teams to send rewards, incentives and e-gifts across the customer lifecycle with a reward point system using workflows at scale. We integrate with CRMs, Survey tools, and email tools and offer API solutions to integrate directly with your products. 

Thousands of businesses of all sizes, from start-ups to large enterprises, use Xoxoday's business currency to send rewards, perks, incentives, & disburse payouts. 2000+ Customers have shipped 80 Million+ rewards globally, making Plum the backbone for branded payments.
data.supported_languages: Arabic, German, English, French, Indonesian, Italian, Dutch, Spanish, Thai, Chinese (Simplified)

Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product. 20 reviewers of Xoxoday have provided feedback on this feature.

initial_reviews.review_title: Xoxoday is absolutely rewarding!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
Using Xoxoday as a corporate rewards platform is as easy and simple as sending someone you adore a heartfelt text message from your smartphone. Xoxoday has a multitude of great reward and voucher options to celebrate your success or to mark your important milestones. Its user experience is simply great. It provides you immense satisfaction of choosing a worthy reward according to your taste and choice. I used Xoxoday just recently to celebrate my 20-year work anniversary, and I must say I am totally satisfied. Xoxoday makes your day!

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
Xoxoday's user experience is great. It can be enhanced if clarity about points and codes, login requirements, and voucher mechanism is provided upfront on the landing page. For example, if I want to redeem a code for an apparel brand, it would be great if a brief about how I can use my voucher for purchasing clothes of that brand is provided along with store details. That would help me take informed decisions.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xoxoday is making the whole employee rewards, recognition, and incentive function amazingly simple, reliable, efficient, and effective. For my organization that has 350,000+ employees globally, Xoxoday has become a global partner in providing top-notch rewards and incentive solutions to its deserving and capable professionals, who demonstrate excellence in their work. My organization has transformed the whole concept into a highly delightful and motivating experience for its employees. And this experience helps us employees keep giving our best to our beloved organization!

initial_reviews.review_title: Such a great platform to provide perks to your employees!!!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
I love how effortless it is to share gift codes with our team for any occasion. With a vast selection of options and coverage across many countries, it's perfect for a global company navigating the complexities of international shipping and taxes. The ability to customize gift cards adds a personal touch, making the selection process even more enjoyable. The support team is fantastic, responding swiftly and ensuring complete satisfaction before closing out a ticket. I truly appreciate their high level of service.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
I wish there were more custom options with the cards that are sent with the gift codes. Or that I could upload my own image to relate to the occasion I am trying to send. Such as a winner of a contest for employees, offboarding farewell wishes, etc.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
XOXOday solves the challenge of sending gift codes to employees worldwide, including hard-to-reach areas. They offer a wide range of options, allowing recipients to choose their own gifts, making the experience more personal and enjoyable. So far my team has really loved this new piece we have brought in!

initial_reviews.review_title: Sharing my personal experience with XOXODAY PLUM Which is the best digital vouchers  platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
The primary reason I truly enjoy xoxoday plum is their 24/7 customer service, which goes above and above to assist you. Send them an email, and they will take care of it in less than a day and with the help of this. Companies can provide employees with customised rewards from a worldwide selection as well as  Businesses can produce personalised mailers by using Xoxoday Plum's Direct Mail Automation tool, which automates direct mail campaigns.
Xoxoday Plum's Account-Based Direct Mail functionality enables companies to manage their direct mail campaigns effectively and thoughtfully and this provides payouts, incentives, prizes, and marketing automation.Due to these below mentioned features its frequency of use increases.

Employee recognition:
Xoxoday Plum is excellent at praising and recognizing staff members for their efforts and accomplishments and aim to optimize ease of use while offering maximum functionality

Loyalty Management:
Xoxoday Plum's loyalty management tools assist companies in establishing and preserving enduring bonds with their clients.

Rewards and Incentives:
Gift cards, experiences, merchandise, and other rewards are all available on Xoxoday Plum. The platform guarantees that all awards are creative and motivating.

Direct Mail Automation:
Its sophisticated automation tools let organisations generate personalised mailers that increase engagement and conversions by systematising direct mail campaigns.This was designed with ease of implementation.

Promotional Product Management:
The platform assists brands in efficiently promoting their goods and services through corporate gifts and event giveaways.

Marketing Automation:
The platform enables brands to interact with their audience and customers at every touchpoint, from email marketing to social media integration.


Account-Based Direct Mail:
It gives companies the ability to carefully and effectively carry out account-based direct mail campaigns.This platform has an excellent ease of integration with other third-party services.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
This platform did not disappoint me in any way. Allthough there may occasionally  be technical issues that cause  gift card coupons to take longer to redeem ,but overall using this platform is quite pleasant.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
If any issue emerges with the gift card voucher code, they will promptly resolve it by consistent follow-ups.

Xoxoday Plum is a creative company that provides services to save overhead costs for businesses that manage employee rewards and incentives. We can use the points that we earned to select gifts from a large selection of products.

Xoxoday Plum is a comprehensive platform designed to revolutionize how businesses style rewards and recognition. From employee to customer allegiance, this useful solution offers an excess of features to meet the various needs of modern establishments.

One of the standout features of Xoxoday Plum is its spontaneous user interface. initial_reviews.review_title: A perfect tool for real time reward
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
As a digital-first company, we always wanted to make our rewards all digital and get over the personalized gifting for everyone every time. Starting with the implementation, to integration to onboarding everything was seamless. The hyper-personalization and real-time reward distribution also let us reward and recognize our employees in a manner that is a win-win situation for both of us. Another thing that I like is their UI, it is simple and elegant and everything is under one screen, so you need not find it difficult to navigate into places.It's been 6 months that we have been using xoxoday as a frequent platform for rewarding and incentivising our Ackers.

Another thing I like about Xoxoday is that they offer data and analytics tools that help us to track the effectiveness of our incentive programs and make data-driven decisions for improvement.

And just in case you face any difficulties, their customer support is round the corner to go above and beyond to help you out. Just drop them an email and it gets resolved under 24 hours.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
I wish there would have been a chatbot on the tool where we can write our issues and it can get resolved. Another thing that could be improved is the wide range of partnerships. Today a user might get confused with all the brands and end up buying the regular vouchers only.

Also, initially we faced a lot of challenges in integrating xoxoday to our current HRMS portal, but once it was sorted, it is a smooth ride.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xoxoday is helping us with three big issues at ACKO.

Personalized rewards: It offers us a variety of reward options, allowing the winners to choose their gifts from the wide range of products using the points. It helps us foster a very strong rewarding environment where everyone's happy.

Administrative Efficiency: It's very easy to use, just enter the email IDs, the amount and in a blink of an eye, the reward is sent to the user's account.

Real-time Recognition: The appreciation feature also let us recognise the amazing work our colleagues have been doing and rewarding them with personalised notes. At time, money is not everything.

initial_reviews.review_title: Xoxoday Plum is a Great Service Provider
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
I like Xoxoday Plum because it has a wide range of reward product offerings. You can access different rewards that are available and relevant either locally or even internationally which makes it one of the best platforms for global rewards procurement and fulfillment solutions. Furthermore, Xoxoday Plum provides one of the best Customer Service experiences, in my experience, as they provide immediate response to any queries you have. I like the fact that emails are promptly delivered and you a informed timely of relevant matters.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
I am disappointed by the fact that there were instances when I experienced issues in the redemption of reward vouchers due to tech-related factors and delays from their vendors. Also, the time of delivery on their site is not accurate. It would indicate that the item/s would arrive instantly when in fact, you would receive it after a day or two, or after you have filed a complaint on their Customer Service.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am currently not experiencing any problems with Xoxoday Plum, hence I can name state any as of this moment. But my most recent issue was probably last month with reward redemption, and that was primarily due to delay caused by a certain vendor. The team immediately acted upon my request to investigate and that helped me be assured that my reward will be delivered to me.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
Using Xoxoday as a corporate rewards platform is as easy and simple as sending someone you adore a heartfelt text message from your smartphone. Xoxoday has a multitude of great reward and voucher options to celebrate your success or to mark your important milestones. Its user experience is simply great. It provides you immense satisfaction of choosing a worthy reward according to your taste and choice. I used Xoxoday just recently to celebrate my 20-year work anniversary, and I must say I am totally satisfied. Xoxoday makes your day!

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
Xoxoday's user experience is great. It can be enhanced if clarity about points and codes, login requirements, and voucher mechanism is provided upfront on the landing page. For example, if I want to redeem a code for an apparel brand, it would be great if a brief about how I can use my voucher for purchasing clothes of that brand is provided along with store details. That would help me take informed decisions.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xoxoday is making the whole employee rewards, recognition, and incentive function amazingly simple, reliable, efficient, and effective. For my organization that has 350,000+ employees globally, Xoxoday has become a global partner in providing top-notch rewards and incentive solutions to its deserving and capable professionals, who demonstrate excellence in their work. My organization has transformed the whole concept into a highly delightful and motivating experience for its employees. And this experience helps us employees keep giving our best to our beloved organization!

all_reviews.review_title: A perfect tool for real time reward
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
As a digital-first company, we always wanted to make our rewards all digital and get over the personalized gifting for everyone every time. Starting with the implementation, to integration to onboarding everything was seamless. The hyper-personalization and real-time reward distribution also let us reward and recognize our employees in a manner that is a win-win situation for both of us. Another thing that I like is their UI, it is simple and elegant and everything is under one screen, so you need not find it difficult to navigate into places.It's been 6 months that we have been using xoxoday as a frequent platform for rewarding and incentivising our Ackers.

Another thing I like about Xoxoday is that they offer data and analytics tools that help us to track the effectiveness of our incentive programs and make data-driven decisions for improvement.

And just in case you face any difficulties, their customer support is round the corner to go above and beyond to help you out. Just drop them an email and it gets resolved under 24 hours.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
I wish there would have been a chatbot on the tool where we can write our issues and it can get resolved. Another thing that could be improved is the wide range of partnerships. Today a user might get confused with all the brands and end up buying the regular vouchers only.

Also, initially we faced a lot of challenges in integrating xoxoday to our current HRMS portal, but once it was sorted, it is a smooth ride.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xoxoday is helping us with three big issues at ACKO.

Personalized rewards: It offers us a variety of reward options, allowing the winners to choose their gifts from the wide range of products using the points. It helps us foster a very strong rewarding environment where everyone's happy.

Administrative Efficiency: It's very easy to use, just enter the email IDs, the amount and in a blink of an eye, the reward is sent to the user's account.

Real-time Recognition: The appreciation feature also let us recognise the amazing work our colleagues have been doing and rewarding them with personalised notes. At time, money is not everything.

all_reviews.review_title: Xoxoday Plum is a Great Service Provider
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
I like Xoxoday Plum because it has a wide range of reward product offerings. You can access different rewards that are available and relevant either locally or even internationally which makes it one of the best platforms for global rewards procurement and fulfillment solutions. Furthermore, Xoxoday Plum provides one of the best Customer Service experiences, in my experience, as they provide immediate response to any queries you have. I like the fact that emails are promptly delivered and you a informed timely of relevant matters.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
I am disappointed by the fact that there were instances when I experienced issues in the redemption of reward vouchers due to tech-related factors and delays from their vendors. Also, the time of delivery on their site is not accurate. It would indicate that the item/s would arrive instantly when in fact, you would receive it after a day or two, or after you have filed a complaint on their Customer Service.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am currently not experiencing any problems with Xoxoday Plum, hence I can name state any as of this moment. But my most recent issue was probably last month with reward redemption, and that was primarily due to delay caused by a certain vendor. The team immediately acted upon my request to investigate and that helped me be assured that my reward will be delivered to me.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
What a great job Xoxoday! At first, I'm a bit disappointed because it's been almost a couple of years user that I don't experience any problem with this site, since I used this to redeem rewards from my Ipsos account. But suddenly, there's a time when I can't use the eGift voucher I have redeemed, totally confusing, so I contacted their support team to help me with it. Within that day they have been emailing me so many times to update me about my query and soon my problem is resolved. I'm totally satisfied with their customer service. They ensure that my issue will be resolved as soon as possible. Nice service. Since I found out about Xoxoday, I've been recommending it to my relatives and friends. I like how to navigate their site, it is convenient and easy. And now that I have experienced their customer service, it's a completely greatest marketplace ever! What I really love about Xoxoday is how they ensure their customer service is on track. They are attentive and impartial to their customer.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
However, aside from their great customer service and easy-to-navigate site, what I really don't like about their service is the lack of instructions. Some of their rewards are inadequate. Hope that in the future the reward is totally specified. Overall, I don't see anything being distressing about this site.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
What has been the problem that I have experienced on using Xoxoday Plum is I cannot use my eGift voucher due invalidation and lack of instructions. And by contacting them, I figuring out how nice is their customer service, they are equity and attentive to my query, they often emailing about the update on my issue and ensuring that I will use my voucher in a fine way sooner, i'm totally glad to experience how they interact with their customer and happy to assist. This store is great and comletely beautiful!

all_reviews.review_title: Does the job but Website UI is cluttered
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
During my time at Infosys, all the employees received INR 5000 coupons as part of the annual performance bonus.

The best part was that all the major e-commerce platforms were partners of Xoxoday plum and I was able to redeem all the 5000 points successfully.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
The email we received from Xoxoday Plum seemed like a phishing attempt from Hackers so many colleagues within the team escalated to the Security team.

Also the UI in my opinion was quite basic and not upto the mark. I found it very cluttered and the experience wasn't enjoyable.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Big Organizations require such platforms to promote employee well being by rewarding them for their work. It is any day better to use such platforms for small amounts than paying in cash since the employee doesn't have to worry about taxes as it isn't linkedIn to their salary accounts. Organization also gets benefitted by exposing the app to their employees in the form of data being shared between them.

all_reviews.review_title: The best e-gift cards delivery platform available.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
A very easy-to-use rewards-sending platform and voucher-buying platform. It offers multiple coupon options in many countries and denominations. It also has a very easy-to-use interface. So it's a bundle of options that make it very smooth to use overall.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
There is nothing to dislike about the platform. They should add Frosta integration. This integration will eliminate the need to rely on manual tasks to send rewards, and the API handles automation and integration, making the overall use of the product much smoother. This saves time, increases efficiency, and makes it less prone to human error when delivering incentives.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xoxo solves the problem of sending rewards/incentives to our survey participants. The variety of options available and the variety of countries represented by xoxo make xoxo the only dependent wallet partner to handle the incentive payment process. Each incentive program is tailored to our needs. I find it easy to use as the interface is very easy to understand and work.
UPI payment feature allows us to quickly add more money when your balance is low. This helps in quickly recharging the wallet again.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
Xoxoday Plum provides us with access to an impressive selection of gift cards and vouchers in countries around the world, which is incredibly helpful to our business as an employee recognition and rewards software vendor.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
Xoxoday has grown quickly the past few years and their engineering team is working hard to deliver a great product and user experience. However, from time to time we experience issues with their API or their last-time updates. With that said, their customer service team is excellent and most issues are resolved quickly.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Xoxoday Plum to provide access to gift cards and vouchers in certain markets around the world. Specifically, our users are able to claim rewards through our platform, Qarrot, that are fulfilled by Plum via their PlumPro API.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
Being acknowledged by my job (incentive).

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
It's really nice to be able to receive the Xoxoday rewards, however; when redeeming them can be a hassle.  On two occasions, I have tried to use the reward in the store and have been unable to both times.  Both times the supervisor tried to assist in typing in the numbers and scanning the bar code on my phone and on paper. It was declined both times. I had to pay cash in order to move forward with my purchases. When purchasing items online, it's easier, but sometimes I want things in the store and not online.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tryin to use the cards in the actual store so one can have to option to receive items of their desire.

all_reviews.review_title: Great platform / solution for market research incentives
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
Xoxo lets us disburse incentives to market research respondents in a very wide range of countries (much more than other platforms we've seen), which is great since our research projects are so international. The customer support is also very good - we've always had quick answers to any questions we had!

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
No real downsides that I see... there were perhaps a couple of issues recharging our account in the very beginning and it being with the Indian currency, but we haven't had that issue for a while now and everything runs smoothly.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xoxoday helps us streamline our incentive process for our market research recipients in a wide range of countries. Since we can recharge the account quickly and disburse the incentives quickly, the respondents are more likely to participate again in a future research project with us.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
It is an amazing platform. Once you've understood the platform, it is very fast.

The link generation is instant and you can track all the backend usage too. In-case of any misuse, One key feature that helps is that you can cancel/stop the link usage anytime.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
Sometimes even when the balance is there, we get an email notification that the balance is low. So maybe that can be rectified. Apart from this have additional provisions for increasing the voucher limit.

Example:
Amazon Gift Card (on amazon) - Limit is 5K/10K
XOXO - Amazon Gift Card  - Limit can be upto 20K too. (This can help for corporates to give larger gifts in a single link, instead of multiple links)

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest problem that XOXOday is solving is for us to get most of the brand vouchers (obv which are onboarded as per the corporate) in a single place. As an events person the fast you can get the code links, the sooner you can send them out too.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
It was very easy to access and the UI is simple enough for even new candidates can understand how to redeem their rewards and check on the activities of other employees. The registration process is straightforward and only takes a couple of minutes to set it up and access the portal. The way the rewards are sent out immediately once redeem without any delay or error in the process is very good with XoXo Plum. I hope this is continued throughout the period.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
The UI and UX can be improved where we can add more elements like gamification and interactive demo for the new candidates. Also, the rewards can be displayed in a way that users will always redeem them right away. Add a bit more UI where you get notified if any events or communication happens around the user to be highlighted. The rewards provided for the survey or feedback can be improved since there are too many competitors out there who are rewarding the end-users much more than what xoxo currently provide.

Recommendations to others considering Xoxoday:
It's an overall good tool that can be very handy when it's used properly. I would strongly suggest anyone who has never tried Xoxoday Plum to try it out once and I bet they will love it. If you are managing a bigger team it's always helpful to reward them using this tool and it's very user friendly

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's quite helpful to provide rewards to candidates every quarter based on their performance. It also helps to track the past rewards provided to the user and notify them via email alerts. The feature where there is no expiry to the points until it's redeemed is very helpful. This tool has improved the communication and the engagement/interaction between the employees in a great manner. It's very helpful when sending out rewards in a bulk way when you have more than 100+ users.

all_reviews.review_title: We use XOXO for our rewards to participants in our studies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
That we can use vouchers to pay rewards in China. Considering that China rewards can be paid only via PayPal, having another option is very good.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
So there was a major problem with participants actually claiming the vouchers. I believe the problem was from the provider side, but it brought us a lot of negative experiences with all participants. The  way of claiming the gift cards was unclear and the provider platform wasn't working, so as a suggestion next time better check the provider services before actually selling the vouchers

Recommendations to others considering Xoxoday:
As advice please make sure that you check your supplier's platforms and their vouchers and ways of claiming. Thank you for being a valuable partner.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Paying rewards to countries that are not very well supplied with voucher options.

all_reviews.review_title: Terrible first experience. Good customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
The agents were helpful and hands-on on my case where the voucher I have didn't get recognized by the merchant. I wasn't interested to use the same voucher with the same merchant anymore. I'm glad that there was a workaround and I was offered Grabfood vouchers instead.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
Based on my personal experience, I dislike that there doesn't seem to be a direct communication between the merchant and voucher provider. In cases like mine where the voucher did not seem to work, the merchant could have reached out  to the voucher provider to further confirm and not just leave it where the customer would have no choice but not to use the voucher anymore. It's just very upsetting and traumatic for a first time user.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Not sure about this question, but I was redirected here from our Rewards team for the customer service assistance on my case. Experience-wise, the timeline and support were satisfactory.

Have been using Xoxoday for our engagement platform for almost a year now. The thing that I like the most about Xoxoday is its relevance.

With its vast range of Gift vouchers, it is really a one-stop for keeping our employees from different geographies happy.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
There is nothing as such that I really dislike about Xoxoday. But yeah, it could be better in terms of the time required to get vouchers - especially if we are ordering for other countries it takes some 3 - 4 business days to get it delivered to our emails.

Recommendations to others considering Xoxoday:
- If you have teams spread geographically, xoxoday is a great platform for engagement
- It cuts down on the hassle of deciding what to give as gifts as users can choose on their own

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Xoxoday really helps us to bridge our geographical gap when it comes to employee engagement. It's fast, its easy and hassle free.

Also, it gives ample of options to choose from too.

The interface of xoxoday website was pretty cool, and we at Colgate were part of the Event Management team. It was hassle-free to purchase the coupons in bulk and use them for our colleagues with great customizable options.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
The food restaurant options could be of more variety, though, but still, denominations-wise, there can be more options  that Plum should think of in the future to promote more.

It is really great to have multiple options for rewarding and felicitating your colleagues and team with xoxoday/Plum.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
The email sending option to bulk is pretty cool, and it has solved the problem of following up with individuals on the coupon redeem and usage status weekly. A lot of time in these manual tasks seems automated for us.

all_reviews.review_title: The perfect gifting experience to a world of corporates
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
1. The options available to redeem the voucher.
2. The stellar customer support- very responsive.
3. The ease of use - addition/deletion of members; sharing of vouchers.
4. The customisation options.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
If we could have more icons for awards in the options list it would be great.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
1. Easiness in rewarding a deserving itizen(employee)
2. A common platform where every internal recognition can be appreciated by all the (itizens)employees
3. Not having to worry about what might be the best reward to an individual(itizens)
Also, earlier, if we reward an employee (itizen), procurement to delivery required a lot of time. This is instantaneous- we are able to reward them right when they are recognised and hence maintain the right feel of the recognition.

all_reviews.review_title: Plum is the best product out there for Gifts
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xoxoday?
It's effortless to use Plum, which I like the best about it. They have thousands of gift cards, and the pricing is also less than others with the services they are providing. And they don't charge any fees, and I love that.

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
What I dislike is that previously I was able to select the number of a few products, but now I can only send one quantity. And I also want to use custom denominations for a few products, and I know it's possible cause I have seen it on a few websites, and it would be great if they could provide it here as well.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm using Xoxoday Plum to deliver gifts to my customers. And it has helped me a lot. My sales have skyrocketed since I started using their product. But I wanted to use their service with WooCommerce also, which is only possible through Zapier, and I used it. Still, it would be more excellent if they could bring WooCommerce integration through their portal rather than use Zapier. And I also want a few products to be added, but they told me it's the holiday season, and they can't add anything before  Jan 2022.

We are a completely remote company at Fox Logistics with team members in the US and abroad. To quickly and easily reward our team for one-off accomplishments, anniversaries, or earned rewards is a quick token of appreciation for the hard work they do in support of our organization. On top of that, XoXo provides direct access to a wealth of vendors in numerous countres - precisely what a company like ours needs!

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
Other than some slight settings issues, not much to dislike at all.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
We strive to make sure our remote team feels appreciated. Xoxo allows us to quickly reach each team member and reward them for the hard work and dedication to our organization day in and day out. Morale is boosted through signs of appreciation, and gratitude is felt through action. We accomplish both with XoXo which is tremendous!

all_reviews.review_title: My experience using Xoxoday for my team
all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Xoxoday helped with:
I wanted to drive a project on the international property onboarding platform for my sales function.

This needed speed of execution, quality assurance, product development, and training.

What do you like best about Xoxoday?
- Flexibility to offer credit points which the employee can use whenever he wants
- Social engagement when the employee gets rewarded in front of his/her peers
- Visibility with their direct managers and leadership
- Recognition of their hard work and persistence

What do you dislike about Xoxoday?
- Need to have more options to customize my greetings on the platform
- Expanding the list of partners for redemption
- Option to direct purchase

Recommendations to others considering Xoxoday:
Prospective clients should definitely try this out in your organization to improve efficiency and create a healthy working environment.

This will be a worthwhile investment which will benefit your business and create a great picture of the work culture both within and outside the organization

We are very satisfied with the product and the team behind running the show.

What problems is Xoxoday solving and how is that benefiting you?
Solutions Required
- Trying to help create visibility of the efforts put in by my team
- Recognition for top performers who defied all odds to succeed

Benefits
- Improvement in employee morale
- Increased eagerness to take up more responsibility
- Healthy competition within the team

all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Xoxoday helped with:
I work in a strategy team where I have to work cross-functionally. In a competitive era, no one was free to help a person on some project which did not fall in their KPIs. My personal relations helped me to get the first time help only but the rewards through XOXO gave small happiness to the other person and they were prompt in helping other people as well. The amount of XOXO points did not matter too much but it was the recognition  (visible to other colleagues) and the gesture (of helping others) mattered.
Thus promoting collaboration across teams in knowledge transfer.
